DOC.brief_summary: Study the effect of the Transversis Abdominis Plane (TAP) block on pain after surgery for obese women undergoing laparoscopic or robotic gynecologic procedures.
DOC.brief_title: Study of TAP and Laparoscopic and Robotic Gynecologic Procedures and Obese Women
DOC.criteria: BMI greater than or equal to 30, women undergoing laparoscopic or robotic inpatient procedures Conversions, nonobese women
